Query: how to install .tar.xz file in ubuntu

Top-3 Similar Questions: su_801159: Cannot decompress .tar.xz file, getting "xz: Cannot exec: No such file or directory" from tar
so_48452726: How to redirect xz's normal stdout when do tar | xz?
Top-3 Scripts:
su_801159: sudo apt-get install xz-utils          # Debian / Ubuntu
sudo yum install xz                    # RHEL / CentOS
sudo zypper in xz                      # OpenSuSE
sudo pacman -S xz                      # Arch Linux

so_48452726: { tar -cvf - paths_to_archive | xz -1 -T0 -v > OUTPUT_FILE.tar.xz; } 2>Log_File

xz -v

{
  xz -1 -T0 -v > OUTPUT_FILE.tar.xz < <(tar -cvf - paths_to_archive) & xz_pid=$!
  while sleep 1; do
    kill -ALRM "$xz_pid" || break
  done
  wait "$xz_pid"
} 2>Log_File

Explanations about Options.-v:
Be verbose. If standard error is connected to a terminal, xz will display a
 progress indicator. Specifying --verbose twice will give even more verbose output.
Explanations about Options.-c:
Write the compressed or decompressed data to standard output instead of a file.
 This implies --keep.
